title: 寻找旋转排序数组中的最小值 (Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array)
content: 思路:二分查找 // @Title: 寻找旋转排序数组中的最小值 (Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-02-20 11:52:08 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 41.2 MB // @comment: 二分查找 // @flag: BLUE class Solution { public int findMin(int[] nums) { int left=0; int right=nums.length-1; while(left<right){ int mid=left+(right-left)/2; if(nums[mid]<nums[right]){ right=mid; }else { left=mid+1; } } return nums[right]; } }
